title: SOTU preview, Sen. Kevin Cramer, R-ND
itunes:title: SOTU preview, Sen. Kevin Cramer, R-ND
description:
A preview of President Trump's upcoming SOTU address  and Republican North Dakota Senator Kevin Cramer talks about negotiations for a border wall, SOTU and trade.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
